requirement.topic: Published messages can be queued by xmlBlaster if the receiver is not logged in
requirement.description: If you publish a message and the receiver is not online, you get an exception by default. If you set the <ForceQueuing> flag is set in the publishing qos, the messages are queued by xmlBlaster. As soon as the receiver logs in, all queued messages are flushed to the recevier.
requirement.example:
<qos>
         <destination queryType='EXACT'>
            Tim
            <ForceQueuing /> <!-- If the destination client is not logged in, queue the messages ->
         </destination>      <!-- Default is no queuing and you get an exception if the client is not reachable -->
      </qos>
requirement.author: ruff@swand.lake.de
